data.title: 5 Tips to Implementing Epic’s Foundation System
data.meta_description: Download the latest white paper from HCI regarding 5 Tips to Implementing Epic’s Foundation System.
data.text:
Scenario: A wind of change is blowing through your hospital after a recent announcement that you’ve decided to join over 400 other organizations that have made the decision to install Epic. As one of the lead executives in charge of this project, you’re thrilled to put a new, state of the art electronic medical record in place to aid your staff in their never ending quest to help your patients. The only problem?

There’s a good chance you’re not sure where to start, and even better one that the process for installing this is just as nebulous. That’s alright; don’t get too excited, we’re going to give you a high level overview of what you can expect in terms of a timeline moving forward.

Looking for additional Epic resources?
